General.Name: Oswal Agro Mills Limited
General.Description: Oswal Agro Mills Limited engages in the trading of commodities in India. It operates through Trading, Real Estate, and Investment segments. The company is also involved in the development and trading of real estate properties. In addition, it invests in equity instruments and other securities, as well as invests surplus funds as interest bearing inter-corporate deposits; and trades in mutual funds. Oswal Agro Mills Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
